original_title: China-SCO trade hits record high in first seven months
article_summary: China-SCO trade reaches record high of 2.11 trillion yuan ($293 billion) in the first seven months of 2021, a 3% year-on-year increase. This marks a significant expansion in China-SCO economic and trade cooperation, with trade volumes repeatedly hitting new highs since the organization's founding in 2001.</s>
